notes: Manufacturers of connected products must enable user access to generated data
Smart devices must make data accessible to users and third parties they designate
Cloud providers must enable switching and ensure interoperability; no switching charges after transition period
Data processing services must comply with switching and portability requirements
Connected vehicles generate data that must be accessible to users; aftermarket repair data access
Smart meters and energy management devices must provide data access
Connected medical devices and health wearables must enable data portability
Public sector bodies can request access to private sector data in exceptional circumstances
